name: Time Runner (Noahkra)
description:
Time runner is a puzzle platformer centered around time traveling that currently has three levels, but I plan on adding more in the future. 

This is my first ever game jam submission (and also the first proper game that I've made). 

The game will take around 5 minutes or so to complete on your first try. It has a built in level timer so you can even try to beat your own times! I hope you enjoy it!

Controls:
WASD - Move
Space - Jump
Shift - Run
E - Interact (press on the crystal for level complete)
R - Reset Level (timer won't reset)
Right Click - Look through time
Left Click - Jump through time
Escape - Quit to menu
